product_name: Patagonia Nano Puff Pullover Jacket - Men's
long_description: Incredibly lightweight and compressible, the men's Patagonia Nano Puff Pullover Jacket keeps you toasty worn as an outer layer or an insulating layer under a shell for cold-weather activities. 60g PrimaLoft One insulation provides excellent warmth and compressibility and will continue to insulate even in damp conditions. Recycled ripstop polyester glides effortlessly when worn with other layers; durable water repellent finish fends off light rain and snow. Brick quilting pattern on front and back and narrow horizonal quilting along side panels stabilizes the insulation; burly thread adds durablility. Easy-venting, deep center-front zipper has wicking interior storm flap and zipper garage at chin for next-to-skin comfort. Packs down to practically nothing and stuffs into the single zippered chest pocket that has a reinforced carabiner clip-in loop. Elasticized cuffs and hem seal out wind and trap warmth. The men's Patagonia Nano Puff pullover offers a regular fit.
short_description: Incredibly lightweight and compressible, the men's Patagonia Nano Puff Pullover Jacket keeps you toasty worn as an outer layer or an insulating layer under a shell for cold-weather activities.
